item.title: Flowers of Algernon
item.description: I’ve just finished reading Flowers of Algernon – picked it up from a thread in hacker news – it’s such a great read. The style of writing changing throughout the book makes for a great literally vehicle – Charlie starts writing phonetically (i.e. the same way I write Greek…), moves on to super-proper-scientist style (following a “smartification” procedure) and finally falls back to his original style as he gradually reverts back.
